main event: Captain Floyd Barnes, a pilot for the USAF, reported observing a large white ball of fire during flight at an altitude of 10,000 feet on 6 May 1948.
interesting points: The event took place between Kwajalein Island and Hickam Field,The ball of fire was observed at a distance of 4 to 5 miles directly ahead and slightly above the aircraft,The sighting lasted only a split second and was described as comparable to the explosion of a shell,No trails or streams were observed, Birng noticed other lights on the water surface after the sighting, possibly from a surface vessel.
sighted object: a large white ball of fire
location: between Kwajalein Island and Hickam Field, Marshall Islands
